name: Harpic Fresh Pine Cleaner
description: Harpic has a special thick formula that reaches tough and unreachable places of the washroom and gives 10 times better cleaning than ordinary cleaners. You get a completely clean & germ-free washroom which you had ever imagined possible. Most powerful toilet cleaner. Removes the toughest stains. Kills all germs. Eliminates limescale. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
